lender.loan_because: I believe each of us can make a difference. We are here to help each other and make the world a better place for all.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to speakers of other languages. My emphasis is on fun and community in the classroom. I really think people learn best if they are engaged and feel comfortable in their learning environment.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship and the drive people have regardless of their background or situation. It's the same passion we're all capable of and some people just live their dreams regardless of their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large bank. I market our financial products and services. I recently studied financial planning and want to support others who aren't able to study to experience finance. Kiva helps me do this.

lender.name: Julie Emanel Millaro
lender.loan_because: Need Capital for the given priority space at Iloilo Airport for the affected ones during the construction 3yrs. ago..A MOA was between the Affected Families that they will give priority for the business ventures...I applied and was granted to have that space and having business there is not a joke really need capital. I was been teaching at kindergarteen here in our place for 10 yrs. not able to pass the board exam so i stopped teaching in our place..this priority was timely and as a risk taker in order to help my husband { private driver} earns a living for our 5 kids..not easy to raised..I applied for that space and got it.. I know OUR GOD is so good since I am a Commerce Graduate major in Management with 18 units ed. I can manage with this new world of business...I applied for refreshment permit and my captured customers everyday are people working here in affordable price also served for passing passengers. Our start up capital is we sell our only one tricycle worth P80,000.00 Eighty Thousand Pesos Only and that amount was spent for the fixtures alone..not enough..I cannot compete established businessman here in our place thats why i need your help...because here there is market everyday and I know I can make it with your help.
lender.occupational_info: My business ventures here is also a help to those who has lower income because I serve lower price like my coffee and snacks (one way of sharing and giving back to the blessing God has given to us).

lender.loan_because: I like eating chicken its very tasty

lender.occupational_info: I work in and office. My job is to help other people with some of details of their day-to-day work so that they have time and energy to do their job really well. I work on the computer typing documents, I make sure that my boss know what meetings to go to and when, and I also ensure that all of the things needed for the meetings are provided.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.occupation: Chairwoman of The Pilion Trust Charity
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and random acts of kindness make the world a stronger and better place to live in....Peace {{*_*}} x
lender.occupational_info: The Pilion Trust is a small multiple complex needs registered charity based in Islington London. We work with homeless people and assist them to become housed. We work with people who suffer from alcohol and drug addictions and assist them to recover from their addictions. We work with people who suffer from mental health problems and support them to live stable lives. We work with the transgender and intersex community to sort out the many complex problems they face and train institutions to understand the daily challenges they find just trying to live normal lives. We work with individual people and groups from communites all over the world providing specialist training, consultancy, conferences and one to one coaching and mentoring support. We do a lot of things for disadvanged and marginalised people and communities with very little money so we can relate to the problems and struggles facing other small entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: i would loan to people to help them because i know how feels to need money for something that you really want to do in your life. i will be willing to help when i can to help others to achieve what they want
lender.occupational_info: i am a very hard worker and i am willing to do anything to be able to get through school to start my own business. right now i am working a factory which is a job that there really is no were to move forward to. i still work very hard at what i do still. i would love to be able to go back to school so that i could do what i really want which is training dogs. i want to be able to help the ones that cant help themselves no matter how old they are. i think that it would be cool to be able to start my own business after i get done with school but i have to try and get through school first to be able to do so.

lender.name: Ravi
lender.occupational_info: Hi my name is Ravi Tadi. I am a college student. I help people who cannot afford computer and technology make it possible. I buy broken computers for cheap or i pick it up for free and fix them with my tools and then donate it to the poor and students who cannot afford computers. Most of the time i done to the computers to mothers because they are onces who need technology to improve their life and give their children more opportunity of learning new stuff. I am very different then others because i am not very smart. So i help people who are struggling with education like myself. I also help people make money and profit on craigslist by making small websites. My work here is nothing compared to the heores who dedicate their lives for helping people in need. I give people second chance.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: It makes perfect sense to contribute in the constant growth of a virtuous circle, to be part of a solution, to help others gain freedom through work and perseverance.
